notes.note: Switch between any of Firefox for Android's 55 supported languages without leaving the browser
Clear History control added to the history panel

Enhanced tab management:

 - Undo a closed tab
 -  List recently closed tabs
 - Close all tabs at once
 - Quick switch-to-tab option when opening a new or private tab
Support URI autocomplete on Swype (and other composition focused) keyboards

Video controls are displayed in the middle of the video ([1005031][1])


  [1]: https://bugzilla.mozilla.org/show_bug.cgi?id=1005031

Does not start on Android L preview (see [1030897][1])


  [1]: https://bugzilla.mozilla.org/show_bug.cgi?id=1030897
